Some of the unexpected happy marriages have broken due to the cheating partners. You either fall in love with your co-star while shooting or just get carried away by the affection of someone whom you meet, and not to forget, nannies! 
Ben Affleck , Jude Law and Ethan Hawke to name a few have fallen for their kids' nannies and this has taken the cheating scandals to the next level. 
Celebrity love triangles is nothing new or unusual. Scott Disick was found cheating on his reality TV star partner of 9 years, Kourtney Kardashian a few months ago. 
It is not unusual to see relationships break due to the cheating which is done by the woman too! For example, Robert Pattinson and Kristen Stewart were like a match made in heaven. However, the happy Twilight stars did not end well as Kristen was found cheating on her partner Robert Pattinson with Rupert Sanders who has two kids with wife, Liberty Ross. This also lead to the end of Sanders marriage to Liberty Ross. 
One of the scandalous cheating celebrity example is of Ashton Kutcher 's. The actor had a public separation with wife Demi Moore when he was found cheating on her with Sara Leal, an administrative assistant. Ashton was married for 6 years to Demi when the couple called it an end due to cheating. Sara came forward and said that Ashton had unprotected sex with her in his hotel room, and hid his marriage saying he was separated. The Most Shocking Celebrity Cheating Scandals 1/21 Woody Allen and Mia Farrow 
Legendary director Woody Allen shocked everyone when it was revealed in 1992 that he was romantically involved with Soon-Yi Previn, his stepdaughter, and the adopted daughter of his longtime love Mia Farrow. he did not adopt her but got married to Previn in 1997. The Most Shocking Celebrity Cheating Scandals 2/21 Tori Spelling and Dean McDermott 
Tori and Dean met on the sets of the TV movie, 'Mind over Murder' when married to other partners. The couple filed for divorce with their individual spouses and tied the knot. However, Dean suffered from sex addiction which took a toll on their married lives. The Most Shocking Celebrity Cheating Scandals 3/21 Ashton Kutcher and Demi Moore 
The actor had a public separation with wife Demi Moore when he was found cheating at Demi with a local blonde, Sara Leal. Ashton was married for 6 years to Demi when the couple called it an end due to cheating. Sara came forward and said that Ashton had unprotected sex with her in his hotel room, and hid his marriage saying he was separated. The Most Shocking Celebrity Cheating Scandals 4/21 Eva Longoria and Tony Parker 
Eva and Tony ended their three years of marriage in November 2010 when the actress found out that Tony cheated on her with his friend's wife, Erin Berry. The Most Shocking Celebrity Cheating Scandals 5/21 Kristen Stewart and Robert Pattinson 
The Twilight stars did not end well off-screen as Kristen was found cheating on her partner Robert Pattinson with Rupert Sanders who has two kids with wife, Liberty Ross. This also lead to the end of Sanders marriage to Liberty Ross. The Most Shocking Celebrity Cheating Scandals 6/21 Shania Twain and Robert Lange 
Shania's 14-year marriage to music producer Robert "Mutt" Lange took an ugly turn when he was caught cheating on the singer with her best friend, Marie-Anne Thiebaud. The couple eventually divorced in June 2010 and she remarried Marie-Anne's ex-husband Frederic Thiebaud in 2011. The Most Shocking Celebrity Cheating Scandals 7/21 Arnold Schwarzenegger 
Arnold cheated on his wife, Maria Shriver. In 2011, he opened up to Maria and admitted that he had a love child with a member of their house staff, Mildred Patricia Baena. Shriver moved out of the house and filed for divorce. Not long after that, actress Brigitte Nielsen came forward and talked about her affair with the actor while he was dating Shriver. However, Maria gave her cheating husband another chance and they started afresh. The Most Shocking Celebrity Cheating Scandals 8/21 Jesse James and Sandra Bullock 
Jesse's infidelities took a toll on their marriage. A week after complimenting about his wife Sandra when she won an Oscar, San Diego-based tattoo model Michelle McGee said that she had an affair since one month with James. Both James and Michelle apologised to Sandra but the couple who got married in 2005 headed for divorce in 2010, courtesy, the Other Woman! The Most Shocking Celebrity Cheating Scandals 9/21 Ben Affleck and Christine Ouzounian 
The latest actor making news for cheating on his wife with a nanny is Ben Affleck. Although his rep denied the rumours claiming it untrue, buzz that Ben and Christine Ouzounian got intimate in Bahamas and she was not fired from the job until his wife, Jennifer Garner came to know. A close friend of the 28-year-old Christine revealed inside details claiming their professional relationship turned romantic. "What started out as a flirtation quickly turned into more," the friend told E! News. "...Eventually she couldn't contain her excitement and spilled the beans that she was dating Ben Affleck... she told her friends she was completely in love with him," the former nanny's friend said. The Most Shocking Celebrity Cheating Scandals 10/21 Mick and Bianca Jagger 
Mick Jagger is well know for his infidelity. He cheated on his wife Bianca Jagger with Jerry Hall who was engaged to Bryan Ferry. Mick and Bianca's marriage ended there. The Most Shocking Celebrity Cheating Scandals 11/21 LeAnn Rimes and Eddie Cibrian 
LeAnn made headlines after cheating on her husband Dean Sheremet. The couple ended in 2009 following press coverage of her extramarital affair with actor Eddie Cibrian while she worked with him on Northern Lights. The adultery also broke Cibrian's 8 years of marriage with Brandi Glanville. Rimes and Cibrian wed on April 22, 2011 but she is getting many negative views for her extra-marital affair and feud with Brandi. The Most Shocking Celebrity Cheating Scandals 12/21 Jude Law and Sienna Miller 
The handsome English actor and father of 5 children with three different women issued a public apology claiming he cheated on his then partner, Sienna Miller with his kids' nanny. "Following the reports in today's papers, I just want to say I am deeply ashamed and upset that I've hurt Sienna and the people most close to us. I want to publicly apologize to Sienna and our respective families for the pain that I have caused. There is no defense for my actions, which I sincerely regret, and I ask that you respect our privacy at this very difficult time," Law said in a statement to the British Press Association after his nanny Daisy Wright went public with a graphic account of their encounter in 2005. The Most Shocking Celebrity Cheating Scandals 13/21 Scott Disick and Kourtney Kardashian 
Scott Disick and Chloe Bartoli were snapped getting close at his trip to Monte Carlo in July. This ultimately lead to his split with long time girlfriend and mother of his 3 kids, Kourtney Kardashian. The Most Shocking Celebrity Cheating Scandals 14/21 Chad Michael Murray and Paris Hilton 
Chad married One Tree Hill co-star Sophia Bush in 2005 but after 5 months of marriage, Bush filed for divorce as Chad hooked up with his House of Wax co-star, Paris Hilton. The Most Shocking Celebrity Cheating Scandals 15/21 David Beckham 
Shockingly, the handsome player too got carried away when he cheated on his sexy wife, Victoria Beckham in 2004 when he was playing for Real Madrid. His personal assistant,Rebecca Loos e came forward and claimed she was having an affair with the soccer player. Interestingly, Victoria said that the affair made her and David stronger and we can see that! The Most Shocking Celebrity Cheating Scandals 16/21 Ethan Hawke 
Ethan's marriage with Uma Thruman did not last long and they filed for divorce. Ethan's affair with their nanny Ryan Shawhughes was reported as the reason behind the divorce. Hawke stated Ryan wasn't the reason for the couple's split, and that he waited until the divorce from Thurman was final before he pursued Ryan. "I know people imagine some kind of Sound Of Music type love affair, but the truth is, by the time Ryan and I were falling in love, it had been a long while since I had employed her," Hawke told a publication. The Most Shocking Celebrity Cheating Scandals 17/21 Hugh Grant 
In 1995, Hugh Grant was arrested in Hollywood for soliciting hooker Divine Brown. This all happened when he was dating Elizabeth Hurley for over eight years. The couple eventually called it quits in 2000. The Most Shocking Celebrity Cheating Scandals 18/21 David Letterman 
The host admitted in 2009 that he had sex with women who worked for him on his show, The Late Show With David Letterman, including his assistant Stephanie Birkitt, while being married to his wife Regina Lasko. The Most Shocking Celebrity Cheating Scandals 19/21 Josh Duggar 
Josh was found cheating on his wife, Anna Duggar by meeting women through dating sites. Josh had accounts not just on Ashley Madison, but also Facebook, Twitter and OK Cupid for meeting women. The Most Shocking Celebrity Cheating Scandals 20/21 Tiger Woods 
The list would be incomplete without the biggest scandal of the decade! Tiger Woods sparked controversy when it was revealed that he cheated on wife Elin Nordegren with a lot of women. The Swedish-born former model eventually divorced the golfer in 2010. You might like
